channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 49 victoria road, 14th October
item.description:
49 victoria road is one unit but has 6 bins. These bins are always left on the pavement and never taken inside. They are always obstructing the way

item.title: Traffic lights facing wrong way, 14th October
item.description:
The traffic light outside Cobalt Square facing traffic coming under the bridge is facing the wrong way again! This has not long been fixed. This is a reoccurring problem. Countless vehicles go through this red light, putting pedestrians at risk at an already vulnerable junction! A longer term solution should be sought to address this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arch 56, South Lambeth Road, Vauxhall, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: Abandoned bike, 14th October
item.description:
This bike has previously been reported but has not been collected. This afternoon someone has tried to use it but threw it in the road and hit a parked car, please come and a remove it as the car that was hit belongs to my neighbor who is disabled
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Road, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two Bags of Leaves on the pavement adjacent to the green opposite No19 Regent Square Belvedere DA17 6EP, 14th October
item.description:
Two bags of leaves, that have been collected by residents are on the pavement adjacent to the green opposite No19 Regent Square Belvedere DA17 6EP. Would arrangements be put in place to collect the bags of leaves as soon as practical.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Regent Square, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More flytipping, 14th October
item.description:
Another sofa has been dumped opposite 27 Cowper road / Cowper close. Clearly the residents of the flats think that once they are finished with their furniture they can simply sling it out on the road - not nice. Maybe a letter should be issued or a sign put up as this keeps occuring - pls can we get this collected?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowper Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders rubbish, 14th October
item.description:
There is a bag of, what appears to be, builders rubbish left beside the garage in Shelley Drive. This was reported a few days ago but only part of the rubbish was removed, this bag was left for some reason. This spot is becoming a regular place for fly tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelley Drive, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped mattresses, 14th October
item.description:
Constant dumped rubbish here … please clear Mattresses dumped by tenants who live in the white block of flats. They simply throw all unwanted household goods onto the pavement near their bins Can you not write to the owner of the building as it’s a crime to flytip

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 219-229, Gordon Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More rubbish dumped, 14th October
item.description:

item.title: Opp 76 Wellington Gardens, 14th October
item.description:
Wooden blocks bearing the legend Property of LPR . There are large nails sticking out of the back, sufficient to rip into the flesh of any passer-by. Please remove PDQ and investigate with LPR.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Gardens, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping from garden slabs on the side plus neighbours rubbish, 14th October
item.description:
Garden slabs on the grass, broken glass along the road, glass bottles there, rubbish left on the grass. Kids are playing around the area and it is honestly filthy!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Russia Dock Road, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet
